entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Ice fog patches developing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill near minus 46. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 2:00 PM MST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 31.
